attributes.action: Ask Parliament to allow the Queen to be made Empress on her Diamond Jubilee.
attributes.additional_details: Many costly memorials have been made to past Kings, Queens and Prime Ministers over the years. No other Monarch has dedicated so much to our Kingdom or served so long. It would be fitting to show the Queen, her nations gratitude whilst she's alive and this would incur little cost in comparison to statues.
attributes.background: For services to The United Kingdom throughout her reign as Monarch Queen Elizabeth has dedicated her life and worked tirelessly on behalf of us all and in return for that lifelong dedication, I believe she should be made Empress Elizabeth of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.
